text: Anyone have any go-to ideas for take-home tests for full-stack, backend, and frontend engineers?

elements.text: Anyone have any go-to ideas for take-home tests for full-stack, backend, and frontend engineers?

text: You can give instructions for building something small, but it tests different skills than the possible actual work of coding new functionality or fixing bugs in a large existing codebase. Alternatives that come to mind could be reviewing some piece of code, or if possible, doing something small in a large codebase. Btw, which languages are you using?
